title: Typeface for "V is for Vendetta" movie
content:
Can anyone ID this face? It seems very indie…like I’ve seen it before in a sample.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=vendetta.jpg)

Thanks,  
Enrico
author: enrico_limcaco

comments.content:
I like that font as well, not sure what it is. Here’s another example -\>

[http://vforvendetta.warnerbros.com/img/poster\_bigV\_web.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329200052/http:/vforvendetta.warnerbros.com/img/poster_bigV_web.jpg)

I don’t mean to hijack the thread, but does anyone happen to know the font used for the other V For Vendetta posters? It has a techno/constructivist fel to it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=vendetta986.gif)
